thread.title: Feds detail how they secretly track Americans phones
thread.title_full: Feds detail how they secretly track Americans phones

title: Feds detail how they secretly track Americans phones
text:
Feds detail how they secretly track Americans' phones 
CNN Money Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
Federal law enforcement officials, in testimony on Capitol Hill Wednesday, gave some long-awaited answers about how they use secret devices to track Americans' cell phones....
